src:
Hasil Balap Moto3 Malaysia: Dalla Porta Menang, Masia Mencengangkan
03 Nov 2019, 11:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Leopard Racing, Lorenzo dalla Porta, sukses meraih kemenangan dalam Moto3 Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Minggu (3/11/2019).
Pebalap Italia ini diikuti oleh pebalap Estrella Galicia 0,0, Sergio Garcia, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Mugen Race, Jaume Masia, di posisi ketiga.
Masia yang seharusnya start dari posisi 11, mengalami masalah teknis pada sighting lap menuju grid. Ia pun terpaksa start dari posisi terbuncit, yakni posisi 30, namun mampu meraih podium.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Honda Team Asia, Ai Ogura, dan pebalap Sky Racing VR46, Celestino Vietti.
Berikut hasil balap Moto3 Malaysia 2019 (17 lap).
text:
Malaysian Moto3 Race Results: Dalla Porta Wins, Masia is Astonishing
Nov 03 2019, 11:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Leopard Racing racer Lorenzo dalla Porta successfully won the Moto3 Malaysia victory at the Sepang Circuit on Sunday (3/11/2019).
The Italian was followed by Estrella Galicia 0.0, Sergio Garcia, in second and Mugen Race, Jaume Masia, in third.
Masia who should have started from position 11, experienced technical problems with sighting laps to the grid. He was forced to start from the top position, which is position 30, but was able to reach the podium.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by Honda Team Asia rider Ai Ogura and Sky Racing VR46 rider Celestino Vietti.
Here are the results of the 2013 Moto3 Malaysia racing (17 laps).
